bin/bbssp.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Bottleneck Biconnected Spanning Subgraph solver.
00003  *
00004  * Solves the bottleneck biconnected spanning subgraph problem (BBSSP) problem
00005  * on the given input file.
00006  *
00007  * @author  John LaRusic
00008  * @ingroup bin
00009  ****************************************************************************/
00010 #include "common.h"
00011 #include "lb.h"
00012 
00013 /* Global variables */
00014 char *program_name;             /**< Program name */
00015 char *input_file = NULL;        /**< Given input TSPLIB file */
00016 char *xml_file = NULL;
00017 int solve_mstsp = ARROW_FALSE;
00018 int sym_transform = ARROW_FALSE;
00019 int deep_copy = ARROW_FALSE;
00020 
00021 /* Program options */
00022 #define NUM_OPTS 5
00023 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00024 {
00025     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00026         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00027     {'x', "xml", "File to write XML output to",
00028         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &xml_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00029     {'m', "solve-mstsp", "solves maximum scatter TSP",
00030         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &solve_mstsp, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00031     {'s', "symmetric", "Transform asym. n city instance to sym. 2n city one",
00032         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &sym_transform, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00033     {'d', "deep-copy", "stores data in full cost-matrix",
00034         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &deep_copy, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE}
00035 };
00036 char *desc = "Bottleneck biconnected spanning subgraph solver";
00037 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp [options] ";
00038 
00039 /* Main method */
00040 int 
00041 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00042 {   
00043     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00044     int max_cost = INT_MAX;
00045     arrow_problem *problem;
00046     arrow_problem input_problem;
00047     arrow_problem mstsp_problem;
00048     arrow_problem sym_problem;
00049     arrow_problem_info info;
00050     arrow_bound_result result;
00051     
00052     /* Read program arguments */
00053     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00054         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00055 
00056     /* Read the problem file */
00057     problem = &input_problem;
00058     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, problem))
00059         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00060     
00061     /* If we want to solve maximum scatter TSP, create BTSP equivalent. */
00062     if(solve_mstsp)
00063     {
00064         printf("Transforming MSTSP instance into equivalent BTSP instance.\n");
00065         max_cost = arrow_problem_max_cost(problem);
00066         if(!arrow_problem_mstsp_to_btsp(deep_copy, problem, max_cost, &mstsp_problem))
00067         {
00068             arrow_print_error("Could not create MSTSP->BTSP transformation.");
00069             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00070         }
00071         problem = &mstsp_problem;
00072     }
00073     
00074     /* Get problem information */
00075     if(!arrow_problem_info_get(problem, ARROW_FALSE, &info))
00076         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00077     
00078     /* Optionally transform problem into 2n symmetric version. */
00079     if(!problem->symmetric  && sym_transform)
00080     {
00081         printf("Transforming asymmetric instances into 2n symmetric instance.\n");
00082         int infinity = info.max_cost * problem->size + 1;
00083         if(!arrow_problem_abtsp_to_sbtsp(ARROW_FALSE, problem, infinity, &sym_problem))
00084         {
00085             arrow_print_error("Could not create transformation.");
00086             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00087         }
00088         problem = &sym_problem;
00089     }
00090     
00091     /* Solve BBSSP */
00092     if(!arrow_bbssp_solve(problem, &info, &result))
00093     {
00094         arrow_print_error("Could not solve BBSSP on file.");
00095         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00096     }
00097     
00098     printf("\nBBSSP Solution: %d\n", result.obj_value);
00099     if(solve_mstsp)
00100     {
00101         printf("MSTSP Equivalent: %d\n", max_cost - result.obj_value);
00102     }
00103     printf("Total Time: %5.2f\n", result.total_time);
00104     
00105     /* Print out XML file if required */
00106     if(xml_file != NULL)
00107     {
00108         FILE *xml;
00109         if(!(xml = fopen(xml_file, "w")))
00110         {
00111             arrow_print_error("Could not open xml file for writing");
00112             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00113             goto CLEANUP;
00114         }
00115         
00116         fprintf(xml, "<arrow_bound type=\"BBSSP\" ");
00117         fprintf(xml, "problem_file=\"%s\"", input_file);
00118         fprintf(xml, " command_args=\"");
00119         arrow_util_print_program_args(argc, argv, xml);
00120         fprintf(xml, "\">\n");
00121         fprintf(xml, "    <objective_value>%d</objective_value>\n", 
00122                 result.obj_value);
00123         if(solve_mstsp)
00124         {
00125             fprintf(xml, "    <mstsp_equivalent>%d</mstsp_equivalent>\n",
00126                 max_cost - result.obj_value);
00127         }
00128         fprintf(xml, "    <total_time>%.2f</total_time>\n", 
00129                 result.total_time);
00130         fprintf(xml, "</arrow_bound>\n");
00131         
00132         fclose(xml);
00133     }
00134         
00135 CLEANUP:
00136     if(!input_problem.symmetric && sym_transform)
00137         arrow_problem_destruct(&sym_problem);
00138     if(solve_mstsp)
00139         arrow_problem_destruct(&mstsp_problem);
00140     arrow_problem_destruct(&input_problem);
00141     arrow_problem_info_destruct(&info);
00142     return ret;
00143 }
